twc_daily.narrative: Showers late. Lows overnight in the low 70s.
Morning showers and thunderstorms. Highs in the mid 80s and lows in the low 70s.
Mix of sun and clouds. Highs in the upper 80s and lows in the low 70s.
Scattered thunderstorms. Highs in the upper 80s and lows in the low 70s.
Scattered thunderstorms possible. Highs in the upper 80s and lows in the low 70s.
Showers possible. Highs in the upper 80s and lows in the low 70s.
Afternoon showers. Highs in the low 90s and lows in the mid 70s.

nws_periods.name: This Afternoon
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 88, with temperatures falling to around 84 in the afternoon. North wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Tonight
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 4am, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 73. Northeast wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.
